attributes.action: Stop plans for the proposed traveller sites in and around Cranbrook, Exeter
attributes.additional_details:
We have travellers currently at the train station site and the problems started to occur immediately after the arrival.
Residents have been verbally abused and threatened.
We have concerns about our town growth, future for business growth and the property prices.
attributes.background: We as residents do not want traveller sites. When we purchased our properties and decided to move to the new town of Cranbrook we were not informed of any plans for traveller sites by the developers or the town council.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
